snippet.title: Off The Grid Cinema - Part 1 - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Off The Grid is a cyberpunk shooter from the mind of District 9 director Neil Blomkamp, and viewers received a cinematic sneak peek of the game's universe during the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022. Off The Grid is due for release in 2023 on PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC. Make sure to check out the Gunzilla Games booth at Gamescom and follow the game’s social channels for the latest updates - oh, and while you’re at it, keep an eye out for Part 2 of the episode you’ve just seen!
